Package tripleplay.ui

Interface Summary
Clickable<T extends Element<T>> Implemented by Elements that can be clicked.
Interface.Task A time based task that requires an update per frame.
Interface.TaskHandle An object that can be used to remove a previously added task.
Menu.AnimFn Produces an animation for a menu.
Scroller.BarRenderer Draws a scroll bar onto a surface.
Scroller.Clippable Interface for customizing how content is clipped and translated.
Scroller.Listener Listens for changes to the scrolling area or offset.
Tabs.Highlighter Defines the highlighting of a tab.
Togglable<T extends Element<T>> Implemented by Elements that expose a selected state and can be clicked.
 

Class Summary
Background A background is responsible for rendering a border and a fill.
Button A button that displays text, or an icon, or both.
CheckBox Displays a checkbox which can be toggled.
ClickableTextWidget<T extends ClickableTextWidget<T>> A text widget that provides button-like behavior.
Constraints Provides various user interface constraints.
Constraints.TextConstraint A special layout constraint used by TextWidgets which adjusts only the text size of the widget, leaving the remaining dimensions (icon, insets, etc.) unmodified.
Element<T extends Element<T>> The root of the interface element hierarchy.
Elements<T extends Elements<T>> Contains other elements and lays them out according to a layout policy.
Field Displays text which can be edited via the Keyboard.getText(playn.core.Keyboard.TextType, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, playn.core.util.Callback) popup.
GlyphWidget<T extends GlyphWidget<T>> Base for widgets that consist of a single glyph.
Group A grouping element that contains other elements and lays them out according to a layout policy.
Interface The main class that integrates the Triple Play UI with a PlayN game.
Label A widget that displays one or more lines of text and/or an icon image.
Layout Defines the interface to layouts, which implement a particular layout policy.
Layout.Constraint An abstract base class for all layout constraints.
LongPressButton A button that supports an action on a "long press".
Menu Holds a collection of MenuItems, dispatching a Menu.itemTriggered() signal when one is selected and triggered.
MenuHost Provides a context for popping up a menu.
MenuHost.Pop An event type for triggering a menu popup.
MenuItem An item in a menu.
Root The root of a display hierarchy.
Scroller A composite element that manages horizontal and vertical scrolling of a single content element.
Scroller.Bar A horizontal or vertical scroll bar.
Selector Maintains a single selected item among a specified set of Element instances.
Shim An invisible widget that simply requests a fixed amount of space.
SimpleStyles Provides a simple style sheet that is useful for development and testing.
SizableGroup A group that allows configuring its preferred size.
SizableWidget<T extends SizableWidget<T>> A widget that allows configuring its preferred size.
Slider Displays a bar and a thumb that can be slid along the bar, representing a floating point value between some minimum and maximum.
Slider.Range Holds the minimum and maximum values for the slider.
Style<V> Defines style properties for interface elements.
Style.Binding<V> Used to configure Styles instances.
Style.HAlignStyle Used to provide concise HAlign style declarations.
Style.PosStyle Used to provide concise Pos style declarations.
Style.TextEffectStyle Used to provide concise TextEffect style declarations.
Style.VAlignStyle Used to provide concise VAlign style declarations.
Styles An immutable collection of styles.
Stylesheet Provides style defaults per element type for a sub-tree of the interface hierarchy.
Stylesheet.Builder Builds stylesheets, obtain via Stylesheet.builder().
Tabs A composite Elements that implements tabbing.
TextWidget<T extends TextWidget<T>> An abstract base class for widgets that contain text.
TogglableTextWidget<T extends TogglableTextWidget<T>> Extends the ClickableTextWidget with toggling behavior.
ToggleButton A toggle button that displays text, or an icon, or both.
ValueLabel A label that displays a ValueView.
Widget<T extends Widget<T>> The base class for all user interface widgets.
 

Enum Summary
MenuItem.ShowText Modes of text display.
Scroller.Behavior Defines the directions available for scrolling.
Style.HAlign Defines horizontal alignment choices.
Style.Mode Defines element modes which can be used to modify an element's styles.
Style.Pos Defines icon position choices.
Style.TextEffect Defines supported text effects.
Style.VAlign Defines vertical alignment choices.
